channel.title: Finding ram and storage
channel.description: How do I determine how many mb of ram and how many gb of storage I need for my server?

item.title: Finding ram and storage
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Usually, a server only needs about… and this is a rough estimation… 50 MB tops of storage. It only needs room for the actual Java code, player save files, etc. If you have cache server-side too, you need more storage, maybe 100 MB or 150 MB.

As far as RAM goes, you need as much as you can get. But for 50-100 players, you’re probably safe with 1 GB or 2 GB of RAM.

Again, these are complete estimations. If you have these requirements, you’re probably fine. But even if you have less, you’re probably fine as well.

Read full topic
